title: SC allows Aakash Educational Services to go ahead with rights issue

title: Fixed-price ATM pacts are the new normal for banks
summary: Indian banks are moving to fixed-price contracts for ATM management. This change replaces older transaction-based models. Banks seek cost stability and assured service quality. This shift aims for predictable expenses and better performance from vendors. Many new ATM and cash recycler contracts are being awarded under this fixed-fee structure. This ensures consistent service and improved customer convenience.

title: Small-cap stocks: Riskier, without a doubt. But time to be contrarian? 6 small-caps from different sectors to keep an eye on
summary: Why look at small-caps when there are many large-cap stocks available at decent valuations? But then, a counter-question: When is it a good time to buy small-cap stocks? When they are rising every second day? Or when there is a correction and the commentary is all negative? The answer is obvious. In early 2024 or before that, in 2023, you could pick almost any small-cap stock and be a winner. That will not happen any more. So, avoid “narrative stocks” and stay away from those with high valuations without matching earnings growth. But that does not mean you should avoid all small-cap stocks. It is probably time to look at them rationally.

title: Fractal Industries IPO Day 3: Issue booked 4x so far — Check GMP, price band, subscription and other details
summary: Fractal Industries IPO is entirely a fresh issue, having no offer-for-sale (OFS) component. This means all proceeds will be received by the company, which plans to use them for funding working capital needs and general corporate purposes.

title: Quote of the day by Microsoft CEO Satya Nadella: ‘Success can cause people to unlearn the habits that…’
summary: Quote of the Day: Satya Nadella used this quote in his 2017 book Hit Refresh. The quote is a reminder for us all that success can lead to complacency sometimes. It is important to stay grounded and empathetic to keep growing and not suffering a fall.

title: FedEx to invest  ₹2,500 crore to build cargo hub at Navi Mumbai Airport
summary: The investment comes ahead of Mumbai airport cargo shutdown, positioning NMIA as a key logistics link connecting India to global trade routes.

title: Market Wrap: Sensex adds 283 points, Nifty tops 25,800 as metal, PSU stocks shine; IT shares keep rally in check
summary: Benchmark indices ended firm on Wednesday, supported by gains in metals and PSU banks even as IT stocks slipped back into decline. The Sensex rose 283 points and the Nifty added 94. Broader markets advanced, while global cues remained mixed and crude prices edged higher amid U.S.–Iran negotiations.

title: Sula Vineyards promoter holding rises to 24.5%, first purchase since IPO in 2022. Check details
summary: Promoter activity returned at Sula Vineyards as Rajeev Suresh Samant lifted his stake to 24.5%—the first increase since the 2022 IPO.  The move comes despite weak Q3 numbers, with profits hit by tactical destocking in Karnataka and softer demand in Bengaluru.

title: Top Gainers & Losers on Feb 18: Godfrey Phillips, Netweb Tech, Hindustan Copper, Marico, BSE among top gainers
summary: The Indian stock market rose on February 18, with key indices gaining for the third consecutive session, led by metal, PSU, and FMCG stocks. The Nifty closed 0.35% higher, while the Sensex gained 0.33%. Broader markets also showed positive momentum, despite a decline in tech stocks.

title: Gold, silver rates today: Should you buy or avoid precious metals during Lunar New Year? Explained
summary: Gold, silver rates today: During China’s Lunar New Year holidays, gold and silver often witness lower participation, as major Asian exchanges—including those in Shanghai and Hong Kong—remain closed, creating a temporary liquidity vacuum, according to market experts.

title: Stock market today: Sensex rises 280 points, Nifty 50 ends above 25,800— 10 key highlights
summary: The Sensex ended 283 points, or 0.34%, higher at 83,734.25, while the Nifty 50 settled at 25,819.35, up 94 points, or 0.37%. The BSE 150 MidCap Index also ended with a decent gain of 0.50%, while the BSE 250 SmallCap Index climbed 0.39%.

title: RBI rate cuts have failed to ease bond yields. Liquidity tools may be next
summary: Government bond yields remain stubbornly high despite a cumulative 125-basis point rate cut since February last year, reflecting supply pressures and weak policy transmission, with the RBI increasingly expected to rely on liquidity support.

title: Netweb shares rally 14% on launch of AI supercomputing system powered by Nvidia
summary: Netweb Technologies shares zoomed 14% after announcing a 'Make in India' AI supercomputer powered by Nvidia. In the afternoon trade, the multibagger stock was trading 7% higher as it pared gains from the day's high.

title: Is Hindalco’s Q3 stumble a one-off hit or a sign the aluminium cycle is cooling?
summary: While operational setbacks at Novelis dented the bottom line, a broader industry downgrade suggests the aluminium rally may have already run its course.

title: What is professional tax and who needs to pay it? Is it part of your CTC? All you need to know
summary: While it is not discussed as widely as income tax, professional tax is crucial for individuals earning incomes from their professions in states where this tax is levied. Here is everything you need to know.
